question: I'm a part-time employee.  What are my coverage options?
text:
I'm a part-time employee.  What are my coverage options?
          
        
Virginia's Insurance Marketplace
is a great source of coverage for part-time employees. If your employer doesn't offer you insurance coverage, or if they offer coverage that does not meet affordability or certain minimum coverage standards, you may be able to access coverage through
Virginia's Insurance Marketplace
. Make sure to apply and enroll in coverage through
Virginia's Insurance Marketplace
during Open Enrollment, which takes place
November 1  January 15
. By submitting a
Virginia's Insurance Marketplace
application, you'll find out if you are:

Eligible to purchase health coverage through
Virginia's Insurance Marketplace
with savings on your monthly premiums and out-of-pocket costs for healthcare services based on your household size and income.

Potentially eligible for no-cost Medicaid coverage, based on your income and other factors.
